name: Connecting to SYSTEM 8 [DEMO]
description:
This game is under development.

You are a wanderer who came to this station because of a signal... What is inside the core?

A fast-paced action adventure where you use the weapons of your enemies against them. Equip your sword with different modules. Explore an abandoned station that's infested with self-controlled AIs.  

// About

Developed by TEAM 8%, a group of game design students from UCSC.

TEAM 8% - Sam Feng, Ziyi Yu, Allan Moua, Nick Pastoria, Salil Tantamjarik, Sean Tran, Lexin Xiong
